Since I am currently at (8, 16) and there are walls to the left (8, 15) and below (9, 16) and a hole below me (9, 16), moving left or down is not a viable option. 

The next logical action would be to move upwards to (7, 16), which is clear ('.'). 

Now, I will execute the upward movement.

``` Action:4 ``` 

This action should help me make progress towards the exit while avoiding immediate hazards. I expect to see my avatar successfully move to a safe position.
